parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch and transmission can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult or impossible to control, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear
the vehicle loses power
the engine RPMs increase without accelerating
the vehicle slows down or stalls
difficulty merging with traffic
and difficulty shifting into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the concentric slave cylinder can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch master cylinder can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the clutch pedal does not return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a delayed return to its normal position
the clutch pedal has a sudden loss of pressure
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the passenger side airbag sensor can prevent the airbag from deploying properly, increasing the risk of neck injuries during an accident.
symptoms: The passenger side airbag does not deploy or deploys improperly
the airbag warning light is illuminated
the passenger side airbag sensor is not sending the proper signal.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Recall Repair and Customer Service
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Ford's inadequate recall repair and customer service can lead to continued safety risks for vehicle owners, as well as frustration and a lack of trust in the manufacturer.
symptoms: The recall repair does not resolve the issue
the manufacturer refuses to acknowledge or address the ongoing problem
poor communication and refusal to assist from customer service representatives.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water leaks into the vehicle can cause electrical system failures, corrosion, and damage to interior components, leading to safety hazards and costly repairs.
symptoms: Water accumulation on the floor
water dripping from the ceiling
water spots on the interior surfaces
musty odor
electrical malfunctions
corrosion on metal components.
